transcript.text: yo guys what's up so yesterday morning I

much but there was also as expected a

aware of the online troll paid accounts
but there seems to be some
well-intentioned people that were just
confused or basing their opinions off
some kind of false assumption and
throwing some shade my way for it so
what this video is gonna be is a

me being triggered I've always been one
that's very in control my emotion it's
very easy for me to detach with what I

or no matter what this person says or

say Jordan they're just gonna ridicule
you don't you know that they're kind of

you're just going into enemy territory
